summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1405, for the improvement of Seventh Avenue West, in the City of Seattle, from West McGraw Street to West Ray Street, by grading, curbing, constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 15288 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
